Caudal entorhinal field of RHA11.CytoDefiningCriteria: The caudal entorhinal field exhibits a strikingly columnar appearance.
TomoDefiningCriteria: Bounded by the dorsal intermediate entorhinal area
Caudal entorhinal field of RHA11.Definition: Part of entorhinal cortex of RHA11 comprising the ventral part of the caudal pole of the rat cerebral hemisphere.  At the caudal extreme, it spans the mediolateral extent of the entorhinal cortex, from the rhinal fissure laterally to the border with the parasubiculum medially.
